description:
You are super hot. And so is your skin (after a long day in the sun, that is). This spray will make you happy as you cool down. Hydrating aloe with natural extracts come together in this all-over body mist. Try putting it in the fridge before you spray it on your body for an extra cooling effect.
For all skin types.
Directions: Spray on your skin after time in the sun.
Every true beauty knows it's what's on the inside that matters.
Formulated without petroleum, parabens, sulfates or phthalates.
Ingredients: aloe barbadensis leaf extract, aqua, caffeine, calendula officinalis extract, chamomilla recutita (matricaria) flower extract, cucumis sativus (cucumber) fruit extract, glycereth-8 esters, glycerin, hamamelis virginiana (witch hazel) extract, lavandula angustifolia (lavender) extract, leuconostoc (radish root) extract, olive oil, panthenol, parfum (natural), salicylic acid, sambucus nigra (elderflower) extract.

Other information: Protect this product from excessive heat and direct sun.

description:
Your sun-kissed skin will feel revived with hydrating Burts Bees Aloe and Linden Flower After Sun Soother. Its specially formulated to replenish and re-condition skin after sun exposure. This quick-absorbing face and body lotion is packed with natural aloe vera and linden flower extract to soothe. Also infused with coconut oil, bee pollen and glycerin to nourish your skin and help replenish its natural moisture. Keep your skin soft and healthy, naturally with this soothing after sun moisturizer.

Usage Directions: Apply to your face and body after sun exposure. Not to be used for children under three years of age.

Ingredients: Aqua (water, eau), cocos nucifera (coconut) oil, glycerin, aloe barbadensis leaf juice, stearic acid, bisabolol, kaolin, parfum (fragrance), aloe barbadensis leaf extract, tilia cordata flower extract, symphytum officinale leaf extract, pollen extract, citrus medica limonum (lemon) peel extract, xanthan gum, mel (honey, miel), lecithin, sucrose distearate, sucrose stearate, glucose, maltodextrin, sodium chloride, sodium borate, phenoxyethanol, sodium benzoate, glucose oxidase, lactoperoxidase, alpha-isomethyl ionone, citronellol, coumarin, geraniol, hexyl cinnamal, limonene, linalool.

Warnings: Keep out of reach of small children. If accidentally swallowed, get medical help or contact a Poison Control Center right away.
title: Burt's Bees® Aloe & Coconut Oil After Sun Soother - 6oz

description: SunBurnt Advanced Sun Recovery After-Sun Gel contains a patented blend of some of Mother Nature’s best ingredients that are proven to cool, soothe and rehydrate sunburned skin. The ultra-hydrating gel has been shown to increase skin hydration by +20%, making it a great way to cool down and recover after a long day in the sun. Best of all, it’s not sticky or drying like basic aloe gels! SunBurnt absorbs quickly without a sticky residue like many other aloe vera gel products, leaving your skin silky smooth and nourished.
